A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Social Justice Warrior is what this film should have been called. I'll keep it short and try not to rant and rave about everything i disliked about the movie. First of all\, keep politics out of entertainment\,  I pay to see a movie to be entertained\, not be lectured into how I should live my life. Second\, the scene with leia surviving in the vacuum of space\, awful. And last\, WHO THE HELL IS SNOKE? Such a big deal was made of him in the previous movie\, and now he is dead and we know nothing.
